description:
QWERTY & AZERTY & QWERTZ Layouts
◊New: Load your own custom theme, help link for details
♠ New : QK can now launch apps, see help link for details
♦ New : Now with 115 Accents/Symbols
♥ New :  12 emoticon buttons  
♣ 11 Keyboard Colors
◊New: ⓑⓤⓑⓑⓛⓔ Keyboard Layout◊

Keyboard or Quick-Keys Always available in the notification area on your phone or tablet.

Quick-Keys Keyboard interacts with virtually every app on your WebOS device (TouchPad owners read at end).


You can type one word and send it to any text field on your device.

Or

With one simple tap of a Quick-Key, You have Quick-Keys that stores anything like a Password, Login, Email, sentence, phone number, or an Address.

Works for any text field on any app on your device.

55 custom Quick-Keys to save for simple one tap access that automatically pastes into a text field.

Send entire sentences with one tap of a button automatically. There is a Quick-Key Timestamp available in two display options.


There is also an 'App mode' (Tap the SpaceShip/Rocket key) that allows you to type up emails, write text message, open a website, open maps to an address, look up a definition, or set & save a Quick-Key for later.

You manually open the "Quick-Keys Keyboard" in the notification area while using a text field when needed or have it already opened ready to use for a text field.

Be Sure to Tap the text field you want to use so the keyboard can send text to the text field when using the Quick-Key Keyboard.


Note(TouchPad Only) :

TouchPad owners for 'web browser' app Only (all other apps work in one Tap to enter information automatically), you will have to use Quick-Keys in two steps, Tap the Quick-Key you want, then long press over text field wanted until the Paste pop up shows, then click paste and your Login or Email or sentence is entered. Mini Keyboard or Quick-Keys for your TouchPad, works with your Stock virtual keyboard & does not replace it (TouchPad Only)
versionNote:
1.1.7  Load your own custom theme, see website help link for details
1.1.6 Quick-Keys can now launch up to 3 applications
1.1.5 New Advanced User Option, Change Rocket Key Function option 
1.1.4 New Advanced User Option, App-Mode Launcher Feature
1.1.3 Added ◊New: ⓑⓤⓑⓑⓛⓔ Keyboard Layout◊
1.1.2 Added 32 more symbols/accents to be included (115 total now supported) and enhanced keyboard function
1.1.0 Two more Advanced User Options
1.0.9 Added Advanced User Options and Help Link that is always visible now, instead of only having help link inside the top left pull down menu.
1.0.7 Added 20 new accent symbols and 12 emoticons 
1.0.5 Added Enhanced Pop-Up Keys Option  
1.0.3  11 Keyboard Color Option Layouts and also optimized Pre3 Landscape Keyboard 
1.0.1 Added 3 Keyboard Layouts and 2 TimeStamp options
